properties.entry: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ? AND MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ADDRESS , MEMBER_ADDRESS2 , MEMBER_EMAIL , MEMBER_PHONE ) VALUES( MEMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ?)
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = ? , MEMBER_NAME = ? , MEMBER_EMAIL = ? , MEMBER_PHONE = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = ? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ?
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_STATUS = 'N' WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NAME = ? AND MEMBER_ADDRESS2 = ? AND MEMBER_ADDRESS = ? AND MEMBER_PHONE = ?
SELECT MEMBER_PWD FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT COST_DATE, CUR_COM - BEFORE_COM AS RES_COM, CUR_ELE - BEFORE_ELE AS RES_ELE, CUR_WAT - BEFORE_WAT AS RES_WAT, CUR_HEA - BEFORE_HEA AS RES_HEA, ROWNUM AS RN FROM ( SELECT COST_DATE, COMMON_BILL AS CUR_COM, LAG(COMMON_BILL) OVER (ORDER BY COST_DATE) AS BEFORE_COM, ELECTRICITY_BILL AS CUR_ELE, LAG(ELECTRICITY_BILL) OVER (ORDER BY COST_DATE) AS BEFORE_ELE, WATER_BILL AS CUR_WAT, LAG(WATER_BILL) OVER (ORDER BY COST_DATE) AS BEFORE_WAT, HEATING_BILL AS CUR_HEA, LAG(HEATING_BILL) OVER (ORDER BY COST_DATE) AS BEFORE_HEA FROM COST WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND COST_DATE IN ('?','?') ORDER BY COST_DATE ) ) WHERE RN > 1
SELECT COST_DATE,COMMON_BILL,ELECTRICITY_BILL,WATER_BILL,HEATING_BILL FROM COST WHERE COST_DATE IN ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (
SELECT BOARD_NO, CG_NAME , BOARD_TITLE , MEMBER_ID , COUNT , CREATE_DATE , RECOMMEND , CG_NO FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING (CG_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_NO=? ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
